Text: Belated congratulationsJohn apologies for taking so long in congratulating both of you and little Michael on the arrival of the newest member of the family Hope every one in particular the mom they always have the most work with new babies is well As a secondary thought dceg continues to do well on a profit basis Youd never know it bu the share price Ultimately the numbers will do the talking and they are looking good again for the nfourth quarter Hope all is well at Enron Should I ask if you were able to at least cash out on any of your options Amazing how a companys fortunes can quickly change Your Uncle Frank Aunt Joan Michelle Christina Joe Alexander and Mathew

Did you receive dceg announcementsJohn have you been getting the annoncements by dceg Also di you notice that last Thursday some shares traded Thats about of the shares OS Also earlier in the week another shares traded Makes you wonder doesnt it John if you want to give me a call you know the home number Thriugh the day my cell is Most important say hello ot Michael and Dina Your Uncle Frank

Need your tel info etcJohn It was really good to hear from you As well I think you have a good idea of what I think of your corporate success Not to take away in any way what I think of you and the family on a personal basis give them all my love John I did send you the article on David Cassies compensation at CIBC World Markets Could you email me your new title to update my files and business address Thanks Uncle Frank
